definition: To recover from an illness or injury, typically referring to the process of regaining health and strength after being unwell. This term is commonly used in medical contexts to describe the progress of a patient's healing or recuperation.

examples.german: Er ist genesen und kann wieder arbeiten.
examples.english: He has recovered and can work again.

examples.german: Nach einer langen Krankheit ist sie endlich genesen.
examples.english: After a long illness, she has finally recovered.

examples.german: Die Natur wird sich von den Waldbränden genesen müssen.
examples.english: Nature will have to recover from the forest fires.

examples.german: Er hofft, dass die Wirtschaft bald genesen wird.
examples.english: He hopes that the economy will recover soon.
